original_text: Then I saw some thrones, and I saw people who were sitting on them. These people had received authority to judge other people. I also saw the souls of people who had died because they served Jesus. People had cut off their heads because they had told the truth about Jesus, and they had spoken God's message. These believers had not worshipped the wild animal or his image. They had not received the wild animal's mark on their heads or on their hands. Now they became alive again. They ruled as kings together with Christ for 1,000 years.
korean_text: 또 내가 보좌들을 보니 거기에 앉은 자들이 있어 심판하는 권세를 받았더라 또 내가 보니 예수를 증언함과 하나님의 말씀 때문에 목 베임을 당한 자들의 영혼들과 또 짐승과 그의 우상에게 경배하지 아니하고 그들의 이마와 손에 그의 표를 받지 아니한 자들이 살아서 그리스도와 더불어 천 년 동안 왕 노릇 하니

sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 몇 개의 옥좌를 보았고

sentences.original_text: and I saw people who were sitting on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 앉아 있는 사람들을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: These people had received authority to judge other people
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 다른 사람들을 심판할 권위를 받았습니다

sentences.original_text: I also saw the souls of people who had died
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 죽은 사람들의 영혼을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: People had cut off their heads
because they had told the truth about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수에 대해 진리를 말했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and they had spoken God's message
These believers had not worshipped the wild animal or his image
sentences.korean_translation: 이 믿는 사람들은 짐승이나 그의 형상을 경배하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They had not received the wild animal's mark on their heads or on their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 머리나 손에 짐승의 표를 받지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They ruled as kings together with Christ for 1,000 years
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그리스도와 함께 1,000년 동안 왕으로 통치했습니다
